title: Apple â€” Cedar apple rust
description: A fungal disease requiring both apple and cedar hosts; orange gelatinous spore horns on leaves in wet weather are typical signs. Remove nearby junipers and apply protective sprays.

treatment.chemical: Apply myclobutanil or propiconazole at pink bud and repeat as needed.
treatment.organic: Remove nearby junipers, use sulfur-based sprays, and prune for airflow.
